pullrequest.title: Make sure gzclient is stopped first, before killing gzserver

content.html:
it looks like this check isn't present in the kill_one_process function

--- gazebo_main.cc  2016-05-26 12:18:54.349216126 -0700
+++ gazebo_main.cc  2016-05-26 12:18:54.345216126 -0700
@@ -87,6 +87,8 @@
         break;
       }
     }
+    if (*_killed == true)
+      break;
    // Sleep briefly
     gazebo::common::Time::Sleep(gazebo::common::Time(sleepSecs));
   }
